name: 尼古拉斯·萨恩兹
name_full: 尼古拉斯·萨恩兹 Nicholas Saenz
introduction: Nicholas Saenz is an actor and voice-over artist, best known for the Richard Linklater film, Another Day at the Office (2019).Saenz most recently voiced the Superman supervillain, Brainiac, and Batman anti-hero, Nightwing, for DC Comics.Nicholas guest starred in the Netflix feature film, Mr. Roosevelt (2017), written & directed by Noël Wells. Among his many television roles is a notable recurring on the John Ridley Emmy-winning ABC series, American Crime (2015).Saenz also played the lead in the Amazon Prime Video thriller feature film, Apartment 413 (2019).
